title: 原版MC如何自定义药水颜色？
author: 镜钥钥
txt_content:
RT就是像染色盔甲那样

以前见过白色的药水
现在想调出来

请问怎么弄？

replies.author: ⊙v⊙
replies.txt_content:
CustomPotionColor标签后面输入10进制颜色代码

/give @p minecraft:potion 1 0 {HideFlags:32,Potion:"minecraft:water",CustomPotionEffects:[{Id:26,Duration:3600}],CustomPotionColor:16122102,display:{Name:"Custom Potion"}}复制代码

https://gaming.stackexchange.com/questions/293540/how-do-i-change-the-name-and-color-of-a-potion

http://minecraft.tools/en/potion.php
